snippet: The pope, who was a cardinal in Buenos Aires, and President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner have clashed over social issues like legalizing gay marriage.
abstract: Pope Francis meets privately with Argentinian Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, with whom he has clashed over social issues, day before his formal installation.

byline.original: By RACHEL DONADIO and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Rachel Donadio reported from Vatican City, and Alan Cowell from London. Elisabetta Povoledo and Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: The pope, who was a cardinal in Buenos Aires, and President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner have clashed over social issues like legalizing gay marriage.

headline.seo: Pope Francis and President Kirchner of Argentina Meet
headline.main: After Frosty Past, Pope Meets Argentine Leader
headline.print_headline: After Frosty Past, Pope Meets Argentine Leader
